short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a hide button to AO3 works and a 'Show Hidden Fics' option to restore them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension Creates a Hide button near the fic name so you can hide fic from the search. On the top page there also will be Show Hidden Fics button to unhide the hidden. Or just delete extension to see all the fics. Works across laptops but you must be logged in to you Chrome acc
